description: Try our easy to follow Roast Pork And Stuffing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Pork And Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line baking dish with baking paper and place rack into dish. Sit pork onto rack. Roast pork for 20 minutes. Reduce heat to 180째C and continue to cook for 1 hour 15 minutes or until cooked through and rind is golden and crisp. Transfer to a warm carving tray, cover loosely with foil and rest for 15 minutes before slicing. Add truss tomatoes to pan and cook for 15 minutes, while pork rests, until softened. Serve.
